title: Ten things you must do in Santorini
text:
Ten things you must do in Santorini Ten things you must do in Santorini Panoramic sunset views, bathing in springs, and adventures through excavated cities... PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 00:01, Sat, Aug 15, 2015 ALAMY Hand-made ceramic pieces sold by people who make them in Megalochori 
1 Scuba dive. The island is a great place for beginners as shoals of exotic fish swim past just inches away. 2 Visit Megalochori and buy one-of-a-kind, hand-made ceramic pieces (right) sold by the people who make them.3 Spend a day on a catamaran. Leave from Vlychada port and sail to the volcano of Nea Kameni.4 Stay in a cave house. Scattered around the island, the former dwellings are now luxurious hotel rooms. 
5 Watch the sun set as you dine. We recommend Aris in Fira for its stunning panoramic views. GETTY Watch the sunset as you dine on delicious Greek food 
6 Visit Art Space, in Exo Gonia, an art gallery, museum and winery all in one. Its owner offers guided tours. 
7 Enjoy a tour of the Donkey Brewery and sample its three beers. 
8 Visit the church of Panagia Episkopi, one of the island’s most beautiful houses of worship. Its ornate carvings and peaceful ambience is a perfect place to take a seat, light a candle and reflect. 
9 Go on a Caldera cruise – you’ll end up bathing in the thermal springs of Palea Kameni and swimming in 35?C waters. 
10 Visit an excavated city. Prehistoric Akrotiri was once buried but has been recently reconstructed. Related articles
